title: Altice International Asks Creditors to Send Copy of Cooperation Agreement
description: Altice International has asked a group of secured creditors to send a copy of the cooperation agreement that binds them to act together in negotiations with the company before starting any potential discussions to restructure its balance sheet, according to a letter seen by Bloomberg.
content: Altice International has asked a group of secured creditors to send a copy of the cooperation agreement that binds them to act together in negotiations with the company before starting any potential discussions to restructure its balance sheet, according to a letter seen by Bloomberg.
